  • Method Details

    • getCursoState

      public static CursoState getCursoState(String idCurso, LocalDate today)
      Returns the current state (CursoState) of a course for a given date.
      Parameters:
      idCurso - id of the course to be checked.
      today - Reference date to be used.
      Returns:
      CursoState of the course for the given date.

    • getCursoState

      public static CursoState getCursoState(CursoDTO curso, LocalDate today)
      Returns the current state (CursoState) of a course for a given date. NOTE: Calling this function will execute a query.
      Parameters:
      curso - CursoDTO to be checked.
      today - Reference date to be used.
      Returns:
      CursoState of the course for the given date.
      See Also:
      • CursoDTO
      • CursoState

    • getCursoState

      public static CursoState getCursoState(CursoDTO curso, LocalDate today, boolean canBeCerrado)
      Returns the current state (CursoState) of a course for a given date. NOTE: Calling this function will execute a query if the parameter canBeCerrado is set to true.
      Parameters:
      curso - CursoDTO to be checked.
      today - Reference date to be used.
      canBeCerrado - true if the curso can be cerrado, false if not.
      Returns:
      CursoState of the course for the given date.

    • getCursoStateDB

      public static String getCursoStateDB(String idCurso)
      Gets the value of the status attribute of the course table. By default this attribute is 'null'. In the class GestionarCursoController.java this attribute is modified to 'CANCELADO' in order to perform course cancellations.
      Parameters:
      idCurso - Id of the course to get its status stored in the database.
      Returns:
      The value of the specified course status attribute.

    • getCursoDTOWithState

      public static List<CursoDTO> getCursoDTOWithState(String cursoId, LocalDate today)
      Returns the cursos with the states. This function will return the CERRADO state in particular, which is not returned by getCursoState.
      Returns:
      Cursos with states.

      public static CursoType getCursoType(String idCurso)

      Returns the current state (InscripcionState) of an inscription for a given id.
      Parameters:
      idInscripcion -
      Returns:
      InscripcionState of the inscription.

      public static InscripcionState getInscripcionState(InscripcionDTO inscr, LocalDate today)
      Returns the current state (InscripcionState) of an inscription.
      Parameters:
      inscr - InscripcionDTO to be checked.
      Returns:
      InscripcionState of the inscription.

    • getInscripcionState

      public static InscripcionState getInscripcionState(InscripcionDTO inscr, List<PagoDTO> pagos, LocalDate today)
      Returns the current state (InscripcionState) of an inscription.
      Parameters:
      inscr - InscripcionDTO to be checked.
      pagos - List of PagoDTO that contains at least every payment related to the inscription.
      Returns:
      InscripcionState of the inscription.

    • getInscripcionState

      public static InscripcionState getInscripcionState(Double coste, List<PagoDTO> pagos)
      Returns the InscripcionState for a given Course and student.
      Parameters:
      coste - Cost of the course.
      pagos - Payments of this student and this course.
      Returns:
      State of the inscription

    • getInscripcionState

      public static InscripcionState getInscripcionState(Double coste, Double pagado)
      Returns the InscripcionState for a given course and student.
      Parameters:
      coste - Cost of the course.
      pagado - Amount paid by the student.
      Returns:
      State of the inscription

    • isDelayed

      public static boolean isDelayed(InscripcionDTO inscr, LocalDate today)
      Returns true if the inscription is delayed.
      Parameters:
      inscr - InscripcionDTO to be checked.
      today - Reference date to be used.
      Returns:
      true if the inscription is delayed, false if not.
